content:
I am an intern in Inria Lyon under the supervision of Mathurin Massias and Rémi Gribonval, in the OCKHAM team led by Rémi Gribonval, working in optimization for Machine Learning.
I will start a PhD in the same team in October financed by the project SHARP of the PEPR-IA. It will be a continuation of my internship: studying the Hessian spectrum of the objective function.
You can find more details on my résumé.
summary: I am an intern in Inria Lyon under the supervision of Mathurin Massias and Rémi Gribonval, in the OCKHAM team led by Rémi Gribonval, working in optimization for Machine Learning.
title: Maël Chaumette
